text:
Lauren Ashley Daigle (born September 9, 1991) is an American contemporary Christian singer. She released her first album "How Can it Be" in 2015. On the "Billboard" Top Christian Albums chart, the album hit #1. It also produced three #1 hits on the "Billboard" Christian Airplay chart ("First", "Trust in You" and "O'Lord").
Daigle's third studio album, "Look Up Child", was released in September 2018. It was boosted by the pop-crossover success of the song "You Say." It began at #3 on the American "Billboard" 200 chart. That made it the highest-charting Christian album by a female artist in over 20 years. It was also #1 on the Top Christian Albums chart.
Daigle won two Grammy Awards, seven GMA Dove Awards, five "Billboard" Music Awards and two American Music Awards. She had four #1 songs on the "Billboard" Christian Airplay and the Hot Christian Chart.
Daigle was born in Lake Charles, Louisiana. She grew up in Lafayette, Louisiana.
